document_data.name: West Center
document_data.mainbody: The '''West Center''' was a ward of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name="CoD.M>
document_data.Activities: Found in the [[Central District]], this ward controlled all activity through the [[Suq Gate]], [[Harbor Gate]], and the [[Grand Bazaar]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Many of Huzuz's tax collectors were based in the West Center. [[Hosan Khalid]] was in charge of the bureaucrats here.
